channel.title: Web Clients
channel.description:
I've signed the .JAR File. And here's what is inside my .html file:
[code] <html> <title>TeleScape Webclient v0.2</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="http://www.website.com/TeleScape.jar" code="client"> </applet></center> </html> [/code]
But for some reason, the webclient hangs on "Requesting Title Screen.. Retrying in 5 seconds" And keeps retrying and wont load. Does anybody know why? Is there something else I have to do?
Thanks in advance -TeleNubby

item.title: Web Clients
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Mrquarter:

Client Hacking section. Tutorial on it.

[s]There’s no tutorial topic on it. Pwnd posting a link to his forums with a tut on there, I used it, but I cant figure out what I replace put.name.of.ClassFile with… Help me on that? (A.K.A. the signing the .jar part of the tut.)

His tut link: http://pwnds.info/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=9d2d8b6f6ec5a37a0843ad7e537fc287&topic=72.0[/s]

I’ve figured the signing part out. Read the problem in the first post.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Clients
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

I’ve signed the .JAR File. And here’s what is inside my .html file:

<html>
<title>TeleScape Webclient v0.2</title>
<center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" 
archive="http://www.website.com/TeleScape.jar" code="client">
</applet></center>
</html>

But for some reason, the webclient hangs on “Requesting Title Screen… Retrying in 5 seconds” And keeps retrying and wont load. Does anybody know why? Is there something else I have to do?

Thanks in advance
-TeleNubby

Read full topic
